com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.eval

Interface EvaluationContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PIPFinder, TraceEngine
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StdEvaluationContext

    public interface EvaluationContext
extends PIPFinder, TraceEngine
    EvaluationContext provides the interface that the PDP uses to evaluate its set of Policies and PolicySets against a Request.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $
    Author:
    car

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PIPResponse getAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest)
      Gets the PIPResponse containing Attributes that match the given PIPRequest from this EvaluationContext.

      Gets the Policy that matches the given IdReferenceMatch.

      Gets the PolicySet that matches the given IdReferenceMatch.
      Request getRequest()
      Gets the original Request provided to the ATTPDPEngine's decide method.
      PolicyFinderResult<PolicyDef> getRootPolicyDef()
      Gets the root PolicyDef from the policy store configured by the particular implementation of the PolicyFinderFactory class.

      • getAttributes

        PIPResponse getAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest)
                          throws PIPException
        Gets the PIPResponse containing Attributes that match the given PIPRequest from this EvaluationContext.
        Parameters:
        pipRequest - the PIPRequest specifying which Attributes to retrieve
        Returns:
        the PIPResponse containing the Status and Attributes
        Throws:
        EvaluationException - if there is an error retrieving the Attributes
        PIPException
